GET /accounts/{account_id}/email-securit.description: This endpoint returns information for each email that matches the search parameter(s).

parameters.description:
The beginning of the search date range.
Defaults to `now - 30 days`.
parameters.name: start

parameters.description:
The end of the search date range.
Defaults to `now`.
parameters.name: end

parameters.description:
Space delimited query term(s).
The search is case-insensitive.

The content of the following email metadata fields are searched:
* alert_id
* CC
* From (envelope_from)
* From Name
* final_disposition
* md5 hash (of any attachment)
* sha1 hash (of any attachment)
* sha256 hash (of any attachment)
* name (of any attachment)
* Reason
* Received DateTime (yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss)
* Sent DateTime (yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss)
* ReplyTo
* To (envelope_to)
* To Name
* Message-ID
* smtp_helo_server_ip
* smtp_previous_hop_ip
* x_originating_ip
* Subject
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Controls whether the message action log in included in the response.
parameters.name: action_log

parameters.description: Filter messages by the provided disposition.
parameters.name: final_disposition

parameters.description: Filter messages by actions applied to them
parameters.name: message_action

detection_reasons: Selector is a source of spam/uce : Smtp-Helo-Server-Ip=127.0.0[dot]186
example.subject: listen, I highly recommend u to read that email, just to ensure not a thing will take place

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

200.description: Search results for the provided query

detection_reasons: Selector is a source of spam/uce : Smtp-Helo-Server-Ip=127.0.0[dot]186
example.subject: listen, I highly recommend u to read that email, just to ensure not a thing will take place

GET /accounts/{account_id}/email-securit.description:
For emails that have a detection, this endpoint returns detection details
such as threat categories, sender information, and links.

headers.name: Subject
headers.value: listen, I highly recommend u to read that email, just to ensure not a thing will take place

GET /accounts/{account_id}/email-securit.description:
For emails that have a detection, this endpoint returns a preview of the
message body as a base64 encoded PNG image.

For emails that have a detection, this endpoint returns the raw email
as an EML file.

example.raw:
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8"

From: sender@example.com
To: recipient@example.com
Subject: Test Email

This is a test email.
